languages.text: "Это — стабильный путь развития. Разумы различных индивидов не равны, дарованные им откровения не равны. Кто-то должен вести, кто-то — доверять ведущему. Всех нас ведет Омниссия, и, возможно, лишь благодаря его первым пророкам и дарованным ими запретам мы еще существуем".

"It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."
languages.original_text: "Это — стабильный путь развития. Разумы различных индивидов не равны, дарованные им откровения не равны. Кто-то должен вести, кто-то — доверять ведущему. Всех нас ведет Омниссия, и, возможно, лишь благодаря его первым пророкам и дарованным ими запретам мы еще существуем".

Some must guide; others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

languages.text: “这才是稳定的成长之路。不同人的思想是不平等的，赐予他们的启示也是不平等的。有些人必须引导他人，而其余人必须信任那些引导者。我们都由欧姆尼塞亚引导，或许正是由于祂最初的那些先知，以及他们赐予我们的禁令，才让我们得以存续。”
languages.original_text: "It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

traits.locale_text: “这才是稳定的成长之路。不同人的思想是不平等的，赐予他们的启示也是不平等的。有些人必须引导他人，而其余人必须信任那些引导者。我们都由欧姆尼塞亚引导，或许正是由于祂最初的那些先知，以及他们赐予我们的禁令，才让我们得以存续。”

languages.text: «Es un camino estable al crecimiento. No todas las mentes de individuos son iguales, y tampoco son iguales las revelaciones que reciben. Unos guían y otros deben confiar en sus guías, aunque todos seguimos al Omnissiah, gracias a cuyos primeros profetas y a las prohibiciones que nos dieron seguimos existiendo».
languages.original_text: "It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

traits.locale_text: «Es un camino estable al crecimiento. No todas las mentes de individuos son iguales, y tampoco son iguales las revelaciones que reciben. Unos guían y otros deben confiar en sus guías, aunque todos seguimos al Omnissiah, gracias a cuyos primeros profetas y a las prohibiciones que nos dieron seguimos existiendo».

languages.text: 「それは安定した成長の道である。異なる個人の心は平等ではない。彼らに授けられる啓示も平等ではない。ある者は導かなければならないし、ある者は導く者を信頼しなければならない。私たちは皆、万機神によって導かれている。そしておそらく、私たちがまだ存在しているのは、神の最初の預言者たちと、彼らが私たちに授けた禁止事項のおかげにほかならないのだ」
languages.original_text: "It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

traits.locale_text: 「それは安定した成長の道である。異なる個人の心は平等ではない。彼らに授けられる啓示も平等ではない。ある者は導かなければならないし、ある者は導く者を信頼しなければならない。私たちは皆、万機神によって導かれている。そしておそらく、私たちがまだ存在しているのは、神の最初の預言者たちと、彼らが私たちに授けた禁止事項のおかげにほかならないのだ」

languages.text: "Das ist ein stabiler Pfad zum Wachstum. Der Verstand verschiedener Individuen ist nicht gleichwertig. Die ihnen gewährten Offenbarungen sind nicht gleichwertig. Manche müssen führen, andere müssen ihnen vertrauen und sich führen lassen. Wir alle werden vom Omnissiah geführt, und vielleicht haben wir es nur seinen ersten Propheten und den von ihnen aufgestellten Verboten zu verdanken, dass wir noch existieren."
languages.original_text: "It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein stabiler Pfad zum Wachstum. Der Verstand verschiedener Individuen ist nicht gleichwertig. Die ihnen gewährten Offenbarungen sind nicht gleichwertig. Manche müssen führen, andere müssen ihnen vertrauen und sich führen lassen. Wir alle werden vom Omnissiah geführt, und vielleicht haben wir es nur seinen ersten Propheten und den von ihnen aufgestellten Verboten zu verdanken, dass wir noch existieren."

languages.text: « C'est une voie stable pour qui veut grandir. Nous ne sommes pas tous égaux en esprit, et les révélations que nous recevons varient grandement d'un individu à l'autre. Certains sont nés pour guider, tandis que d'autres doivent se contenter de suivre ces guides. Nous sommes tous guidés par l'Omnimessie, et ce n'est peut-être que grâce à Ses premiers prophètes et à leurs interdictions que nous sommes encore là aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une voie stable pour qui veut grandir. Nous ne sommes pas tous égaux en esprit, et les révélations que nous recevons varient grandement d'un individu à l'autre. Certains sont nés pour guider, tandis que d'autres doivent se contenter de suivre ces guides. Nous sommes tous guidés par l'Omnimessie, et ce n'est peut-être que grâce à Ses premiers prophètes et à leurs interdictions que nous sommes encore là aujourd'hui. »

languages.original_text: "It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

languages.text: "Gelişmeye yol açan, stabil bir yoldur. Farklı bireylerin zihinleri birbirine eşit değildir. Onlara bahşedilen farkındalıklar da eşit değildir. Kimileri rehberlik etmeli, kalanlarsa o rehberlik edenlere güvenmelidir. Hepimiz Hermesih'in rehberliğindeyiz. Belki de O'nun ilk peygamberleri ve onların bize armağan ettiği yasaklar sayesinde varlığımızı sürdürüyoruz."
languages.original_text: "It is a stable path for growth. The minds of different individuals are not equal. The revelations bestowed upon them are not equal. Some must guide, and others must trust those who guide them. We are all guided by the Omnissiah, and perhaps it is only thanks to His first prophets and the prohibitions they gifted us that we still exist."

traits.locale_text: "Gelişmeye yol açan stabil bir yoldur. Farklı bireylerin zihinleri birbirine eşit değildir. Onlara bahşedilen farkındalıklar da eşit değildir. Bazıları rehberlik etmeli, diğerleri de o rehberlik edenlere güvenmelidir. Hepimiz Hermesih'in rehberliğindeyiz ve belki de O'nun ilk peygamberleri ve onların da bize armağan ettikleri yasaklar sayesinde varlığımızı sürdürmekteyiz."
